message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the reconstruction of 3D faces from 2D images using 3D Morphable Models, which is a topic related to computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR). The proposed method involves optimizing the correspondence between 2D and 3D landmarks, which is a problem in multimedia (cs.MM) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of landmark weighting to improve accuracy is a statistical approach (cs.LG).
